Translations.Text: Ne$, day ur walan ara ar Öebbi i Ixelqen tamurt akked igenwan, Izmer a d Ixleq i ten icban? Irra yasen lajel, ur degs ccekk. Ur b$in imednas, siwa tijehli
Ini: "lemmer tesâim igerrujen uêunu n Mass iw, ur ten tepnalem, a ppagwadem a ten tûeôôfem. Amdan izga d imceêêi
Ni$ Nefka, i Musa, tza issekniyen iberrzen. Steqsi At Isôail. Mi d iusa $uôsen, inna yas Ferâun: "a Musa! Nek, wala$, war ccekk, seêêern ak
Inna: "ni$ teéôiv ur d issers yiwen wigi, d tiftilin, siwa Mass n tmurt akked igenwan. Nek, wala$, a Ferâun, war ccekk, tîeêênev
Ib$a a ten iééaâ si tmurt, N$emmeq it, akked wid iddan yides, meôôa
Deffir es, Nenna i At Isôail: "zed$et tamurt. Mi d tusa lemâahda n laxeôt, a kwen id Nawi, d îayfat
Nessers it id s tidep. S tidep, ay d irs. Nuzen ik id, kan, i ubecceô d uneddeô
Leqwôan Nfeôq it, iwakken a t temlev i medden, s laâqel. Nessader it id, s l$eôv
Ini: "amnet yis, ne$ qqimet". Ih, ma mlan t i wid tebbwev tussna, uqbel is, ad $lin $ef udmawen, knan
Ad inin: "gedha s Mass nne$! Tûaô lemâahda n Mass nne
Ad $lin $ef udmawen s imeîîawen. Ad innerni wannuz nnsen
Ini: "nujet $er Öebbi, ne$ nujet $er Uênin. Akken tnujem, ineS ismawen imaânen yifen akw wiyav". Di téallit ik, ur saâlay ûûut ik, ur t ssrusu. Ad isker kan
Ini: "ccekôan i Öebbi, ur Nesâi aqcic, ur Nesâi acrik di tgelda, ur Nesâi bab mgal asdullu". Ssem$weô iT yal tem$weô
Ccekôan i Öebbi, id Issersen Tazmamt, i uxdim iS. Aâwaj, degs, ur Irri
Tewqem, iwakken a ppâaggen $ef ssxev uwâiô, s$uôeS; u a pbecceô lmumnin ixeddmen ayen ilhan, ar nnsen warraz igerzen
Ad ilin degs, i lebda
A ppâaggen i wid innan: "Öebbi Isâa mmi S
Ur illi wayen ssnen fellas; akken, imezwura nnsen. D awal uqbiê id iff$en seg imawen nnsen. D tikerkas kan ay ssawalen
Ahat a phelkev iman ik, ar loiha nnsen, a p$weblev, imi ur uminen ara s usali agi
Ni$ Nerra i illan di tmurt, d ccbaêa ines, iwakken a Néeô menyif iten, ar igiten ilhan
A Nu$al a Nerr, i illan degs, d akal ibuôen
Ne$ t$ilev d At yifri kan, akked Öaqim, ay d lwehma, ger issekniyen nne£
Mi ssôen iman nnsen ilmeéiyen deg ifri, nnan: "a Mass nne$! Efk ane$ d aêunu s$uôeK; Err a$ lameô nne$ d uûwib
Deg ifri, Nesle$ imeééu$en nnsen, acêal iseggwasen
Sinna, Nessker iten id, a Néeô anta, ger snat n trebbuyaâ, i iêesben acêal qqimen
Nekwni, ad ak Neêku, s tidep, taqsiî nnsen. Nitni, ih, d ilmeéiyen, umnen s Mass nnsen. Nerna yasen nnhaya
Nesseohed ulawen nnsen, mi kren nnan: "Mass nne$ d Mass n tmurt akked igenwan. Ur nepnuju, d awez$i, ar ôebbi, war Neppa, mulac a d nini awal dduni
Widak d agdud nne$. Âabden iôebbiten, war Neppa. Ay$eô ur a$ d bbwin, fellasen, adabu n ûûeê? Anwa i idensen sennig win id igren tikerkas $ef Öebbi
Mi ten tfuôqem, nitni akked wayen âabden war Öebbi, essôet iman nwen deg ifri. Ad awen Izraâ, Mass nnwen, seg uêunu S. Ad awen Iheggi amwanes i lameô nnwen
